com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:title: Hours to wait
com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:summary: A wait hour of zero (0) means that rating starts affecting the event-type's score immediately after the event.

com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:title: Hours before stop
com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:summary: A stop hour of 24h means that rating stops affecting the event-type's score 24 hours after the event.

com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:title: Minimum quantity limit
com.pavelsikun.seekbarpreference.SeekBar.android:summary: The tag should occur at minimum this amount to be shown in statistics.
